mapper.select: select psb.psb_seq psb_seq, psb.psb_title psb_title, psb.psb_writer psb_writer, psb.psb_thumb psb_thumb, ps.ps_age ps_age, ps.ps_gender ps_gender, ps.ps_address1 ps_address1, psb.psb_petType psb_petType, ps.ps_resident_type ps_resident_type, psb.psb_service psb_service, psb.psb_contents psb_contents, psb.psb_start_day psb_start_day, psb.psb_end_day psb_end_day, psb.psb_time psb_time from petsitter_board psb, petsitter ps where ps.ps_id=#{writer} and psb.psb_seq=#{seq}
select * from petsitter_board order by psb_seq desc
select * from (select petsitter_board.*, row_number () over (order by psb_seq desc) rnum from petsitter_board)where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
